greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of "e"s in n (in English).
comment: a(A006933(n)) = 0; a(A008520(n)) > 0; a(A121065(n)) = n and a(m) != n for m < A121065(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 24 2015
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Roel and Bas van Dijk, Numerals package, Hackage (Haskell packages)
Robert G. Wilson v, English names for the numbers from 0 to 11159 without spaces or hyphens .
Index entries for sequences related to number of letters in n
example: a(123) = 5 because "onE hundrEd twEnty-thrEE" has 5 e's.
program: import Data.Text (Text); import qualified Data.Text as T (unpack))
import qualified Text.Numeral.Language.EN as EN  -- see link
a085513 = length . filter (== 'e') . T.unpack . numeral where
results.author: Samuel Thompson (samuelt(AT)ugcs.caltech.edu), Jul 03 2003
